page.title: 10A CROSS GIRL'S SATURDAY
page.content: Helen wakes up around{8am.}She goes downstairs & watches{Breakfast TV.}She has{cereal, toast with butter}& {marmalade, & tea}for breakfast, & sometimes{washes the dishes.}If it is a nice day, she{goes outside}until dinnertime _ playing on her{bike or making{mud pies.}When Linda gets up they play on the{see_saw}and{cycle around the farm.They have{dinner}at {12pm.}Helen's favourite is{roast beef with{mashed tatties, gravy}&{carrots. In the{afternoon}they go to{Gran's}at Westbrough. They come{home for tea (perhaps{spaghetti bolognaise}& {cabbage}with{tea}to drink), after which they{watch TV.}Then she has a {bath,}a{hair wash, gets dried}& puts on her{"goony".}She{brushes her teeth &{goes to bed}around{9pm.
